  • traveled from Windhoek, Namibia to Nairobi, Kenya

  • visited the Kipepeo Community Empowerment Program near Kisumu, Kenya. What started just as a visit turned into spending a day with friends. It is amazing to see what Moses, Julius and Jethron are doing for the local community, from micro-loaning to building a school. It was was very special day to me and that kind of experience that I will never forget. I still have to figure out on how I can help on a long-term basis with them! From mirco-loans to bulding a school and feeding kids, they really help the local community.

Jonas is a freelance product manager and web developer. He translates between developers and humans. Born in Germany he now travels the world and works remotely.
